title: Herb Garden Essential Oil Sampler
cleaned_text: An invigorating, uplifting herbal quartet from any garden of aromatic plants. Our Herb Garden Essential Oil Sampler contains one each of the following oils in 4 ml glass vials, beautifully packaged in an organza bag: Rosemary from Morocco Marjoram from Egypt Thyme linalool from Spain Peppermint from the USA For external use only. Properly dilute all essential oils in lotion or vegetable carrier oil before massage or other topical use. Keep out of reach of children. If you are pregnant, nursing, have any health conditions, or are taking medications, please consult your healthcare provider prior to using essential oils.
